title: MiraMed to Exhibit at AHIMA 2015
text:
MiraMed Global Services 
JACKSON, Mich. -- (BUSINESS WIRE) -- MiraMed Global Services (MiraMed), a leader in healthcare business processing outsourcing (BPO) solutions, announces it will be attending the 87 th AHIMA Convention & Exhibit . AHIMA 2015, with a theme of HIM Without Walls , is being held September 26 th – 30 th , 2015 in New Orleans, LA at the Ernest N. Morial Convention Center. The 87 th AHIMA Convention and Exhibit takes place at a critical point in health information history, making the convention a must-attend event for professionals across all healthcare segments: providers, payers, vendors, coders, consultants and secondary data users. 
MiraMed will be in booth #523 and will be featuring its premier global revenue cycle and BPO services which allow providers to maximize their return on revenue cycle activities, such as ICD-10 coding, early-out/self-pay collections and account receivable debt recovery. MiraMed partners with hospitals, health networks, physician practices, payers and related industry service organizations to deliver sustainable financial results by leveraging knowledge process outsourcing (KPO) and information technology outsourcing (ITO) strategies to uncover and capitalize on hidden financial opportunities, improve productivity and ultimately increase operating margins and profits. 
Tony Mira, President and CEO of MiraMed Global Services, says, “AHIMA 2015 is an exciting conference for MiraMed. Since we focus exclusively on the healthcare market, health information management (HIM) is a priority for MiraMed. With AHIMA and healthcare professionals we can provide a better more effective quality of patient care. We believe in the work of AHIMA and are proud to support the American Health Information Management Association.” 
About MiraMed 
Headquartered in Jackson, Michigan, MiraMed Global Services stands as the premier global provider of business process outsourcing solutions to healthcare organizations nationwide. MiraMed partners with hospitals, health networks, physician practices and related industry service organizations to provide a broad portfolio of customizable solutions, uncover and capitalize on hidden financial opportunities, improve productivity and ultimately increase profits. MiraMed has offices in Jackson, Michigan, Chicago, Illinois, Portland, Oregon, Thousand Oaks, California, Dallas, Texas, Boston, Massachusetts, Greenville, South Carolina, Baton Rouge, Louisiana, Chennai, India and Manila, Philippines. 
MiraMed pairs healthcare industry experts with world-class processes, infrastructure and technology to deliver meaningful and measurable results. This proprietary model enables sustainable change by delivering a complete, customizable "end-to-end" solution devised to meet a client's own unique financial and organizational needs.
